description: California Lilac (Ceanothus 'Concha') is an amazing plant species. It produces beautiful bright blue, fragrant flowers that bloom in spring, creating a picturesque floral display. They also have a unique and striking silver-green foliage that looks great in any garden setting. The California lilac is a low-maintenance, drought-tolerant plant that is perfect for areas with low water availability. It requires little pruning and can live in a wide range of soils. Plus, it attracts beneficial pollinators such as bees, butterflies, and hummingbirds! California lilac is an excellent addition to any landscape and is sure to make an eye-catching statement.
